short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the context menu to quickly create ZenKM resources in ZenCase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the context menu to quickly create ZenKM resources in ZenCase. You can quickly highlight text, then right-click to send information to ZenCase as a ZenKM subject, fact, authority, question, answer, or document.
